sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This work was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (number 81500596) and Cultivation Project of Chongqing Youth Medical High-end Reserve Talents (number 2017HBRC015) awarded to Dr. Wuquan Deng.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: All data generated and/or analyzed during this study are included in the published article.
